text: I can never remember which multiply is which.  Cross, dot, “normal”, (others?!).  Does anyone know of a nice short(ish) pdf I can download and refer to whenever I inevitably forget?

elements.text: I can never remember which multiply is which.  Cross, dot, “normal”, (others?!).  Does anyone know of a nice short(ish) pdf I can download and refer to whenever I inevitably forget?

text: cross keeps dimensions, dot removes dimensions. you can think of the x as being "more than one thing" and the . being "you just get one thing back, period"
